item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

ok… so I have been asking to know how to add commands well i went into my commands file and started looking at the commands… they start out like this if (playerCommand.startswith("command")) and the way people have been telling me to add them is different… but i just started looking at the way they started out so i just started to understand how to add them… and i thoguth i could add one however i was having like 4 errors when i compiled… so here is what i tried to add and here is my errors

EDIT: i narrowed it down to one error here is what the code is now

[code]if (playerCommand.startswith("(home)") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) {
c.getPA().startTeleport((3086),3493)“modern”);

            }  [/code]

and here is what the error is

EDIT: my bad forgot to box out the command
